We are Paradox, the AI company that believes recruiting is a people game. Our flagship product is Olivia, the AI recruiting assistant obsessed with improving and reinventing the candidate experience.Olivia helps companies capture and screen candidates, improve conversions, and answer all candidate questions. She delivers one-to-one candidate experience at scale, and even handles interview scheduling.

Recruiting.Ai is transforming recruiting software through the power of natural language processing and artificial intelligence. Olivia is the company’s flagship product, designed to build a better candidate experience through an A.I. powered personal assistant.

Recruiting.comWe help companies compete for talent.  At Recruiting.com, our innovative talent acquisition software enables organizations to find and effectively recruit talent through our social, mobile and search engine optimized career sites and our candidate relationship management system.ResponsibilitiesResponsible for Sales, Business Development, and Operations.· Lead the marketing contact strategy for promotional campaigns & lifecycle programs· Partner with business intelligence team to define KPIs, metrics and solutions to ensure data integrity      for each new program· Work with cross-functional groups such as product, creative, IT, operations, etc.· Drive revenue through customer acquisition, on-boarding, engagement, retention and loyalty programs· Define business requirements, evaluate, implement and manage CRM tools· Set annual goals and KPIs and devise and implement measurement plans· Own the reporting and dissemination of performance results to the Executive Leadership Team· Identify and evaluate strategic marketing partnership opportunities· Manage, train, nurture and inspire a high performing marketing and sales team· Work closely with Brand and Content Marketing teams to develop holistic communications strategies

Life of Substance is an online apparel and awareness brand linking needs of non-profits to wearable art and fashion. The primary focus of Life of Substance is to create awareness of domestic and global opportunities and start dialogue about how to create meaningful movements around these causes. Starting dialogue and inspiring individual action remains the cornerstone mission and vision of the organization. Founder and Creative Director

Krystle Kibler
Project Manager | "Cutting-Edge Strategies"
January 27, 2014, Krystle reported directly to Benjamin

It is my pleasure to recommend Ben Bromberg. Ben was my manager the majority of my tenure with the School of Advanced Studies. Without his leadership, I would not have the skills I have today as a doctoral advisor. Ben is without doubt a very competent manager and is particularly talented at motivating and inspiring his team members. His impressive soft skills allow him to easily cooperate with diverse personalities. Ben also has the invaluable ability to think outside the box – he often comes up with creative solutions. He demonstrates a very positive can-do attitude and is not afraid of change. Even under high pressure, he kept our spirits up and increased the team's morale. Ben is a very communicative and outgoing leader. Ben would be an asset to any employer and I recommend him for any endeavor he chooses to pursue.

Ben is a driven individual, who is not afraid to on a leadership role for both his staff and his peers. He understands business needs and effectively aligns himself and his staff to meet the needs of the organization. Ben is very action oriented and proactive. He willingly takes the lead role if he feels he can contribute positively to achieving organizational goals. This willingness to lead, and set a good example, helps him create positive followership in his staff as well as in his peers. Because we’re of similar mindsets, Ben and I work well together at University of Phoenix as peers and I often seek out his leadership advice in spite of the fact that I have been in a manager role longer than he has. Any company would be positively impacted by employing Ben. If asked, I would give Ben my highest recommendation.
